Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), glslang-dev, libasound2-dev, libavcodec-dev, libavdevice-dev, libavformat-dev, libavutil-dev, libdbus-1-dev, libdrm-dev, libegl-dev, libflac-dev, libfreetype-dev, libgbm-dev (>= 9.0), libglm-dev, libjack-jackd2-dev, libminiupnpc-dev, libopenal-dev, libpulse-dev, libsdl2-dev, libspirv-cross-c-shared-dev, libstb-dev, libswscale-dev, libudev-dev, libusb-1.0-0-dev (>= 1.0.16), libv4l-dev, libvulkan-dev, libx11-xcb-dev, libxinerama-dev, libxml2-dev, libxv-dev, libxxf86vm-dev, pkg-config, python3-dev, qtbase5-dev, spirv-tools, wayland-protocols, x11proto-xext-dev, zlib1g-dev
Package-List: retroarch deb otherosfs optional arch=any retroarch-dev deb devel optional arch=all
